title: Berwick Indian at the Courthouse
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian cuisine restaurant, has a dedicated vegetarian menu list where the dishes are or can be made vegan except ones with paneer (cheese) and the veg korma. Uses canola oil. Most breads are vegan but do let your server know if you're vegan to be sure. All rice dishes are vegan suitable, mint sauce and raita are not.
